snippet: Logano overcame a stop-and-go penalty early in the caution-filled race and kept Brad Keselowski at bay after a restart with four laps to go in the 82-lap race.
lead_paragraph: Logano overcame a stop-and-go penalty early in the caution-filled race and kept Brad Keselowski at bay after a restart with four laps to go in the 82-lap race.

headline.main: Joey Logano Wins at Watkins Glen
